# Projen Starter Checklist

- [ ] Choose projen project type (`npx projen new <type>`)
- [ ] Confirm `.projenrc.*` exists and is minimal
- [ ] Add scripts contract (build/test/lint/fmt/typecheck/dev)
- [ ] Ensure lockfiles committed and used
- [ ] Document `npx projen` (synth) command
- [ ] Add docs skeleton + RepoSpec
